mapper.select: select fs.finance_id,fs.shop_id,fs.shop_name,sum(initial_inventory_cost) initial_inventory_cost,sum(final_inventory_cost) final_inventory_cost, sum(sshtch.fba_send_quantity*(head_trip_cost_after+sku.cost_price)) send_cost,sum(fs.procurement_cost+fs.fba_head_trip_cost) sale_cost, sum(main_business_income) main_business_income,sum(manual_adjustment) manual_adjustment from `financial_statement` fs left join shop_sku_head_trip_cost_his sshtch on sshtch.shop_sku_id=fs.`shop_sku_id` left join shop_sku ss on ss.`shop_sku_id`=fs.`shop_sku_id` LEFT JOIN sku ON ss.`sku_id`=sku.`sku_id` where fs.`finance_id`=#{financeId} ORDER BY ss.`shop_parent_sku`,sku.`sku`
